document.full_text: david rosen, the hospital executive accused of being involved in a corruption scheme, says he has paid a consultancy fee or two to politicians, but never a bribe, to save hospitals.
document.title: about new york: charges against health care executive raise broader issues
lines_and_colors: david rosen, the hospital executive accused of being involved in a corruption scheme, says he has paid a consultancy fee or two to politicians, but never a bribe, to save hospitals.
